Linndare ɓanndu ( e ɗemngal ingilishire physical disability, naakasare ɓanndu nyaɗɗo e howterde taa rellugo motsango,o jijiyaaje ɓanndu koo rellungo' samɓe jokkole ɓanndu e kawtal linndare ɓanndu e hawturde rellugo'o nanɗe giiɗe koo jammu ɗou kosɗe e ceeya hemngo maarago'o hannde e janngo'o kama yaawuje jokkole ɓanndu e fumnɗe e rellugo nanɗe noffi nyaɗɗo kama ceeyajaamu e ciiya nannɗe koo hemgo giiɗe Disability_culture nannɗe[1][2]
hoto,en[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
E ɗon heebeta linndiɓɓe koo daygo heeɓetogo nder ceeyajaamu faro innaje too sa,ere o waaɗite waadengo reedu koo hemgo ceeyajaamu taa nder ɓawarde kwayaje tanngade kama perinatal disability e acquired taa hakkunde satiiwal heeɓeti daygo maako ngal ɗon yeeyata
Human yiis too nder wamnde haa too prolonged lack e wurtingo,o oxygen e obstruction too faro e dimma fabuhitallazih kafar respiratory tract damage to the brain sa,ere daygo ɓenndo heeɓetoɗo linndare ɓanndu baawande accidental e heebetande linndiɓɓe e taa nder sa'ere ɓawarde daygo maɓɓe jooditol ceeya keebare ɓanndu e nanngo yaawuje ko nauɗum ɓanndu ɓe kebeti yawtago'o jokkole ɓanndu nyaɗɗo
Na'eje linndare ɓanndu[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
Ceeyajaamu e ceeya keebaawal ɓanndu koo motsengo'o jokkole mawɗe e faamarɗe taa nder ɓawarde naakasake ɓanndu e junngo nyaɗɗo kallungol waddotu jakkode ɓanndu e nder linndare rellugo
kowcitol ɓanndu e nder sa'ere daygol taa nder dalila ya'uree yimmɓe heebe yawtago' eyaal kosngal koo junngo e ɓe keɓetae nakasake ɓanndu[3]

Bankiiru mawndu ndu Lesde Duuniyaaru yerdi hokkan Lsdi Zambia Ceede nyamaande ko hewtanta $270m Dalaaji Cede Lesdi America.
Nyaande Ceede den ngam wallabe haro fintin ki kilantaaji Riskuuji Lsdi ndin musamman ko konu hakkiunde Lesdi Ukraine waddani be.
Nder Hitaande 2020 Lesdi Zambia naatino nder yanayuuji giddy ko laarani tampere kilantaaji Riskuuji ngam gannudi batten yaw COVID 19.
Nder lewru August, hukuuma hakkilanta nballa njawka ka IMF yerdi wallalan Lesdi Zambia bee nballa Ceede ko hewtani $1.3bn Dalaaje.
Hooreejo Bankiiru ndun, David Malpass teri hokkoobe nyamaande wallita LesdiZambia.
SADIQ ALFA

Enid Mary Blyton (11 August 1897 - 28 Noofambar 1968) wonnooɗo winndaako ɓiyɓe leydi Ingiltere, defte mum laati bestseller nder duuniyaaru gila duuɓi 1930's, jaaynde ɓuri miliyaaruuji 600. Deftere maako ɗonno ɓeyda ɓurugo anndugo, nden ɗonno haaldiraa nder ɗemɗe cappanɗe joweego. Ha nder lewru Juun 2019, Blyton waɗi nokku 4 ngam jaayndiyanke ɓurɗo tuubuki. O winndi dow kuuje ɗuuɗɗe, hawti e janngude, taariika, fantasy, mistik, e haalaji Bibel. O ɓurɗo haaduki hannde ngam defte maako noddy, Famous Five, Secret Seven, the Five Find-Outers, e Malory Towers, koo nde o winndi feere feere feere, hawti e St. Clare's, The Naughtiest Girl, e The Faraway Tree series.

Prime ministaajo Lesdi India Narendra Modi yaari ngilla ka sembidinki narral hakkunde mabbe bee Lesdi Misra.
Modi waddi ngilla ka golle jee nyalde 2 bawti O yahi jee nyalde 4 haa Lesdi America nde O yiidino bee ardiido Lesdi America Joe Biden,enanta luttube ardiibe be Lesdi India wonbe haaton. Doo on ngilla maako arannde iga hitaande 1997.
Modi enanta Madbouly wadi giidal bee kastaabe musamman ngam senbidinki kilantaaji riskuuji hakkunde Lesde den 2.
Giidal ngal tawete bee Gidde Gite ardiibehakkunde Lesde den 2.
Taskaraji kewdi wadaama ngam jahargal yeeso mabbe sanne.
Modi taskani ngilla haa nokkuuje feerefeere nder man woodi haa be iri Guski ummaatoore Lesdi India laariibe konu Duuniyaaru aranndeere enanta bee Juulirde nde Al, Al-Hakim,fuu haa Lesdi Misra.

Majaliisaaru dogginirgal laamu lesdi Naajeeriya FEC yerdi bee hetande yaake majjirru ceede lesdi hakkunde hitande 2018 faaki hitande 2020.
Taskaram MTEF e FSP ɗum hetande on nde taskita nde duuɓi tati ngam arduki laabi huusitorde hiiso ceede lesdi e ko mooɓi nder laabi ɗin fuu.
Taskaram MTEF taskitaama on ngam huuɓa nufooji fintinki kilantaaku riskuuji lesdi tabiɗɗi potori e tabutunki adilaaku nder laabi majjinol ceede ɗe hetaa nder hiiso lesdi no handi.
Ministaajo hiiso ceede e taskarmji maari, Senator Udoma Udo Udoma, andini dow taskaram MTEF niijaama on dow ceede peturuljam lesdi dow tammunde nde weeti fuu ndi wurtinan nebbam ɗam ɗuuɗal maajam hewtata looɗe/ barrels miliyonji 2.3.
Hiiso ngon heti Ceede nebbam sorran dalaaji 45 nder hitande 2018 nden daraja nayra Naajeeriya boo hetaama N305 dow darnde dala.

Ina woodi e nder aduna hee ɗo njurum woodi. Yeru, e lewru saawiyee 2015 ɓennundu nduu, haala gorko gooto jahroowo e duuɓi 56, mo nganndu-ɗaa ñalawma fof ina fiya 33 kiloomeeteer e koyɗe (jahol e kootol) ngam yahde nokku ɗo gollotoo ɗoo. Omo waɗa yolnde ndee laabi joy yontere kala, woni 165 kiloomeeteer, woni ko ɓuri yolnde hakkunde Eeleega e Butelmiit !
Ndeen kabaaru oo siyii e internet, sanɗa gooto jahroowo e duuɓi 19 woni e renndinande mo ballal. E ñalawma gooto o heɓi 35 000 dolaar (ko ɓuri miliyoŋaaji 10 ugiyya men oo), kadi woodi dokkuɗo mo oto.
E nder jonte tati o heɓi 330 000 dolaar (100 miliyoŋ ugiyya), o rokkaa kadi oto keso pul. Nde o fayi e heɓde ɗum, omo wondi e sanɗa denndinantunooɗo mo ballal oo, o sikkatnoo ko oto oo tan o dañi. Kono ko jaɓɓungal o waɗanaa, o heɓi oto e kaalis haa heewi. Ɗumɗoo dey waɗi ko to leydi Amerik, to wuro ina wiyee Detroit.
So diine men tedduɗo oo wasiyiima njurum feewde e tagoore, yurmotooɓe keewaani e renndo men. Wonaa ƴettooɓe jawdi ndi yimɓe fof ndenndunoo ina mbonna, juulɓe ina maaya heege, wonaa hay e mbeddaaji men ɗo jom otooji en mbirtoo yahrooɓe koyɗe, njolnataa ɗum en, kono kadi punndina ɗum en… Ina haannoo, so “tuubakooɓe” ɓurii en ganndal e jawdi, ɓuren ɓe ɓerɗe. Kono, so tawii ko Alla haaldetee, renndooji men ko e ballondiral mahii, sibu hay gooto waalataa boowal, tee galle ngar-ɗaa kala a bismete, ñaamaa, njaraa… Ɗuum alaa toon ! Ndeke enen ko heen tan ngon-ɗen, hoto njawen ! BAB/Fooyre

Hooreejo leydi Muritani Mohamed Ghazwaani hollitii wonde anndaano wonde luulndo ngoo won e yimɓe njettiima e daawal luulndaade mo haa mbaɗtori yiɗande Muritani njangu ceɓɓitaagu, o wiyi wonanii mo bettere mawnde, huunde nde o tijjanooki.
Ɗuum yalti ko e jokkondiral makko hanki ngal o waɗdi e muritaninaaɓe wonɓe to ngenndiiji Dentuɗi Amerik. O ɓeydii heen, luulndaade laamu makko, fotaani addande won luulndiiɓe yiɗande leydi ndii bonannde. Gargol makko e laamu, e ko gollii gila o ari e jappeere 2019, wonaa yiɗde lohnude luulndo walla warde ngo haa ɓuuɓa, deeƴa e no o teeŋtiniri.
O teeŋtinii, kanko fof e addude nguura, ndiyam e kuuraa nder teemedde gure mawɗe nder ɗii duuɓi tati cakkitiiɗe, haɗaani bowlol luulndo ngoo fof ko wiyde ɗomka e heege ine woodi.
O wiyi sukaaɓe muritaninaaɓe ine kaandi e golle, ngam ɓeydude moƴƴitinde sarɗiiji nguurndam mumen, darnde luulndo ngoo foti abbitaade ko e ngonka ɓiɗɗo leydi…kono ngo hiilnii tan ko yiɗande leydi ndii njanguuji seɓɓitiiɓe.

Ardiiɓe kuwertiir malaadii iniwersel mo diiwaan Maatam, njeeƴiima e mitiyelaaji 26 e kominaaji e nder diiwaan. Sabu ko komin kala mitiyel cellal gooto. Mitiyelaaji ko heɓata safroyaade e nder dispaaseer, opitaal ko heewi ɓe nduttaaka ɗiin kaalisaaji to bannge laamu ngu. Hannde oo ɓe mbeltiima fotde 4 miliyaar ruttaama ɗeen ñamaale. Ko woni heen caɗeele ɗe ko ɓeen fiyatnooɓe ina njooɗoo hitaande piyaani. Sabu heewɓe mbiyata ko njooɗiima
hitaande ñawaani ñawiraaka mbaawataa ɓeydude heen haydara. Tawa ko roŋkude faamde ɗuum ko jokkere enɗam. So a ƴeewii neɗɗo gooto joom galle o fiyata naatirde mum ko 200mb hitaande nde ko 700mb. To bannge safaara maa 20 mb fof laamu ngu ina yoɓan maa 18 mb mitiyel o yoɓan maa 4 mb ɗo potno ɗaa yoɓde 100mb njoɓaa 20 mb njoɓane ɗaa 80 mb fawaade e nokkuuji ciifondiraaɗi ɗi. Hannde o fuɗɗiima waylowaylo no feewi e yoga e mitiyelaaji. Kamɓe ardiiɓe nokku o ɓe kirjinii renndo ngo e nootitaade e paabi ɗi.
Bookar Sek Lewlewal Maatam

Bawti seyo lamar nyalow maare Rewbedum Lesde Duuniyaaru fu, kawtal Rewbe be shaanu kiita haa Lesdi Naajeeriya (NAWJN), nodditiri rewbe besda kawtal koppi nden be hokkita rewbe ndimu mabbe bana worbe.
Haalaksan wurti haa hunduko The association, Hon. justice Roli Harriman, mo wolwi darned hooreejo kawtal ngal, Justice Jummai Sankey, haa lamar mabbe nde nyalowmaare Rewbe 2023.
“hitaande 2021, majaliisa moobgal Lesde Duuniyaaru UN omti taskaram nyalw maare Rewbebe tokkol ko diidaangol mabbe 75/274 wi 10 Lewru March ndeye fu nyaloomaare mabbe.
Roli wi fakat niiman hebaama on ngam sanadu tiinaare rewbe on ngam yaada bee worbe hedi laabi feer feere bana di Siyaasa,kuude jahargal yeeso,tefre joonde jam, ‘e ko nanndi’enon.
O tefri Ardiibe hawtaade bee kawte joodiide ko’e muudum bana NGOs hawta wadda walliinde mabbe ngam Rewbe besda hebuki dartirde.
SADIQ ALFA

Yuɓɓude komitee fii doginde ñaawoore e dow ko faati e haɗeede les frères musul dille maɓɓe
Fedde winndere: laamu Ejipt tintinii kabaaru feŋngude komitee fii doginde ñaawoore e dow ko faati hadde les frère musulman dille maɓɓe e honoo jawɗe keɓtaaɗe e ndee ɗoon fedde ɗee njogoraa waɗeede.
Cimtol jaaynde qur’aaniyaŋkoore international (iqna) egginiɗum ko e jaaynde Ejiptnaare (Al sharqul awsaɗ), oo ɗoon komitee soomi ko lomtooɓe minister justice, jeyanɗe, jokkondire renndo, ɓamtaare nder-nderi, lomtooɓe bank central, njuɓɓudi hoolayru ngendi, fedde aynooɓe jawɗe e pelle goomuyaŋkooji.
Source ji ñaawirdu Ejipt tintiniino ko adii wonde: awokaa les frères musulmans oo e dow ko faati e ñaawoore lewru ɓennundu e dow ko faati e haɗeede fedde ndee dille mun, o ñaaginooma nde ndee ɗoon ñaawoore laartetee, naamndal makko ngal jogoraama yuurnitoyeede ñande 02 octobre. 1297948

Ngomnaajo jiha Zamfara, Dr. Dauda Lawal office makko do hunda be jami’en kude rento nder jihakan ngam yigo be teteni derekejo njaggantodo leddi mo wujjobe himbe wujji nder balade shalude ha nder jihakan.
Ngmnaajo on famtini banning mai on ha wakkati nde o yillno Directaajo maudo mo hukuma hakkilinowa dereke’en jaggantobe leddi be NYSC, Brigadier General Yushau’ Ahme ha fada lamorde hukuuma kan ha Abuja nyande alamissa do.
Ngomna Lawal wii wujjago derekeejo on metti masin nden bo duum kulniduum faago dereke’en luttube larugo no fitinaaji soinde rento beddata satugo ha jiha kan ema leddifu jonta.
O efti alkawal duuw ngomnati makko beddan tinaare linchita kotoi dabbita derekeejo on seto be hapti ha o woni nder njamu makko ha fahin be yonki makko to Allah munyi.
Nde o jabanno Directaajo NYSC mo leddi yetti ngomnaajo on be hollugo heare ema ndotaaku o hoi alkawal duuw hukuma NYSC hauran jude be ngomnati jihaka ha wurtungo derekeejo on ha o wonifu nebatado.

Wadobe wankore kibbi ha duuw labi maudii nder led Indonessiya bawo nde be Sali yerdago be anniya Ngomnati leddindin duuw umminan himbe ko wadataa ujunere ha chi’e mabbe ngam be kokka kampaniwa leddi china tigga kude mum ha leddindin
Soinde famtotiral hakkunde Ngomnati be ummatore ledddindin fuddi ko burata leuru ha himbe ko wadata 7,500 wurti ha duuw labi do jogi derejii ema buuti holla wannere mabbe be jabruude nyiddude de be mbi Ngomnati lenndindi yidi wannabe asar ha duuw jaule mabbe.
Police en boi kebbimnama ha duuw labi maudi ngam fadda wadobee wankojee man amma ha warugo jonta duum saloori. Se dei rentobe mai tumirama be nafturgo chittaje nyadde ha sankutuggo be.
Non non nder dubi ko salima himbe leddindin ngadino wankore bana nde mai ha wakkati be tumino police’en be soja’en duuw do njama neddaku mabbe wola ko be wawi wadugo ha man.
Mininstajoo fiiji siyaasa e rento ummatore leddindi fodi hakkilo himbe duuw dayo waddugo ko umminta ummatore hakkiloo o holli be yerdata ko sedda danyango leddindin fitinaji soinde jonde jam.
SADIQ ALFA

Santiago (/ˌsæntiˈɑːɡoʊ/, US maa /ˌsɑːn-/;[]Espaañol:: [sanˈtjaɣo]), anndiraa jawdi Santiago de Chile, woni laamorgo e wuro ɓurɗo mawnude nder lesdi Ciile e nder go'o nder gure ɓurɗe mawnude nder Americas ɗon haandi nder lesdi lesdi lesdi ndin, nden woni ɓandu lesdi Santiago, ɗo yimɓe ɗuuɗani 7 miliyaar, ko ɗum waɗi 40% yimɓe Leysdi ndin. Ɓurɗo nder wuro ɗon haadi hakkunde 500-650 m (1,640-2,133 ft) dow maayo.
Duule gariiri ɗon hawta bee gese inabooje, nden Santiago ɗon yaasi diga kooseeje e maayo Fuuta.
Ngendam[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
Santiago ko wonde laamorgo Leysdi Cile gila wakkati koloniyaal.Dow wuro woodi gariiri nder gariiri nder karnijum 19th neoclassical (architecture e winding side-streets featuring a mix of art deco, neo-gothic, e style feere). Luttugol Santiago ɗon haandi bee kooseeje feere feere e maayo Mapocho, je ɗon ɓuwa bee parki bana Parque Forestal e Balmaceda Park.Andes Mountains waawi yi'ugo diga ɓurna fuɗɗi gariiri nden e ɗon walli ngam nyau smog, musamman nder wakkati winter, ngam walaa ndiyam.Santiago woni nokkuure politik e jawdi lesdi Chile e nder nokkuure nde laamorde lesdi ɗuuɗal nder Leysdi.
Sheree[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
Luttuɓe laamu Chile e laamu nguu ɗon haɗi Santiago, nden Congres ɓurna fuu ɗon hawta nder Valparaíso.

Hewtani duubi 6 Lesdi Morocco do yiida bee hokkere nganm yanayuuji sella haa bakkeeje den bananta ministaajo mo hakkilanta shaanu yanayuuji enanta ndiyam, Nizar Baraka, wi
Lesdi Morocco,nokkuure on burde marki remoobe mallabo huuwoobe kuude ndemri ko hewtani gebe 14% nder 100 haa Lesdi do wuurtina yaaki Lesde yaasi.
Ngam soynde ndiyam haa Lesdi Morocco besdi sadirmaaji sane nden waddi nguleenga masin haa Beeli ngam sanadu hokkere man.
Ministaajo shaanu ndenri hiisi bee wiki gannudin besdan haa yaaki hitaande 2050.
Haa non wadi be wi mbeeli nder bakkeeje waylaari Lesde Africa do luttiri bee hiiso ko hewtani 23.5% dum do tiiti nyiddudum sane yeeso bananta Mr Baraka wi.
Niiman yotti haa nder galluuje godde be do mabbe golbi ndiyam mabbe bee jimma.
Niiman haa yotti hukuumaaji hoosi jabrude kanndude haro nyibuki nokkuuje ko wallata haro tencuki mallabo ko hurgata gannudi di be ngontiri ko laarani hokke haa Lesdi ndin.
Dooko ragare hitaande 2027, Morocco taskani nyibuki nokkuuje ko wallatabe usta gannudi din ko hewtani 7 ko hoosata teddenga ko hewtani millionji 143 bedonno mari ko hewtani 12 mardum teddeenga 179.3 millionji.
SADIQ ALFA

jokku taroHe nder cappanɗe jawtuɗe ɗee (1960-2020) ene teskaa pelle keewɗe cosaama heen ngam daranaade ɓamtaare ɗemngal Pulaar/Fulfulde e ƴellitaare pinal Fulɓe. Woon heen ko pelle ngenndiije jogiiɗe peŋɗe e cate he nder keeri leyɗeele mum en, goɗɗe heen nii ko taƴti keeriije denndinɗe dowlaaji keewɗi walla terɗe jeyaaɗe he leyɗeele ceertuɗe; kono won heen ko goomuuji haralleeɓe jogiiɓe payndaale laaɓtuɗe e jiyanɗe he holno ɗeen payndaale njettortee.

Yimɓe heewɓe ina kaawaa, ina mettini e keewal senerooji e konu Muritani. Wonaa tan sabu waasde ɗum haande, kono sabu kadi teddeendi majjum wonande ngalu leydi ndii. E nder duuɓi 10 fat, ko ina wona 45 koninke nomaama Seneraal.
Hannde konu Muritani nguu ina jogii 34 seneraal gonɗo e golle. So ƴeewdaama e Maruk walla Senegaal, eɗen paama ɗum haaɗii lamɗam haa ɓurti. Konu Maruk ina jogii 325 000 koninke (wowaaɓe e sukaaɓe wonɓe e heblo limaaka heen), kono jogii ko senerooji 5 fat. Konu Senegaal ina waɗi 11 000 koninke, kono hannde jogii ko senerooji 2 fat ! Alaa no ɗum waawi faamoraade so wonaa sabu nafooje ngalu keewɗe ɗe kala Seneraal rokkaa : otooji jooɗɗi, reenooɓe, galleeji, ndaamordi, njoɓdi keewndi ekn. tawi noon ko ɓuri heewde e koninkooɓe, walla gollotooɓe laamu woɗɓe, ko nanndi e jannginooɓe e safrooɓe, njoɓkal mum en alaa no foti. Tee joom mum en alaa ko mbaɗani leydi, ma a taw nii meeɗaa yahde hay wolde wootere, so wonaa dey waɗde walla wallitde jamfaaji laamu woni kuudetaaji. E wiyde lowre enternet ina wiyee Taqadoum, ko ɗuum addani won ɓeen koninkooɓe wullitaade to « Taqadoum » « paltoor puŋŋiniiɗo, kersiniiɗo, baɗeteeɗo e nomgol senerooji, tuugiiɗo e banndiraagal, e jiidigal leñol… ». http://taqadoum.mr/node/6252

Jibinannde Afrik, Asii, Amerik latin, nde imperiyaal feeñi, naatani jiimde aduna oo kala, dartiima, haɓaa, haɓtii haa nde poolgu añɓe darni koloñaal e ɗeen leyɗeele. Jibinannde Muritani wonaani sara e ɗiin kareeli. Kono ndeen, nde tawnoo leydi men wonaa leydi ndentundi, ndi laamu ngootu, njiimaandi ngootiri, Muritaninaaɓe kaɓtorii ko ina ceerti, moni fof bannge mum e diiwaan mo wonnoo oo, no wonirnoo oon dumunna. E oon sahaa noon dowlaaji ɓurnooɗi yiytinaade ko ɗiiɗoo : Fuuta Tooro, Gooy, Emiraa
... (2750 chars skipped) ... 
 seernaaɓe ɓe Naseer Eddiin woni tiitoonde mum en) ;
– laamɓe Waalo e kala ɓe nguurndam mum en yowitii e laamu lorla, keeranii Hasaan en.
Tuubakooɓe, nde tawnoo ina peertani nafooje mum en, nguuranii laamɓe Waalo e Hasaan en, mballitiri ɓe petelaaji, kure e conndi. E nder hitaande 1674, Naseer Eddiin waraa e wolde ɗo haɓtotonoo Heddi (jogorɗo wonde Emiir Tararsa). Lomto Naseer Eddiin timmuɗo saɗi dañde caggal makko. Ɗuum e geɗe goɗɗe (bayɗe no ballal tuubakooɓe Farayse, maccuɓe e Baadoolo en noo
... (2750 chars skipped) ...
ummii ko e Arab, e Baraku (woni Barke) woni ko waɗaa barke.
Rewɓe Waalo Barak ina nganndiranoo jaambaraagal; e ngoon yeeso, bartagol rewɓe Ndeer e hitaande 1820 ngam ruppaade kalifaandi ina heewi jangteede. Laamɗo Waalo hono Jommbot Mbooc (mo miñum biyeteeɗo Ndate Yalla lomtinoo) resondiriino e laamɗo Taraarsa en ñalnde 18 suwee 1833 to Daqana ngam aawde dañee hakkunde Waalo Waalo en e Taraarsa en. Ɓe ndañdi ɓiɗɗo biyeteeɗo Ely Jommbot, laamiiɗo Taraarsa tuggi 1878 haa 1886.

Ngomnati kawtal Lesi Naajeeriya hokki Ceede ko hewtani N2.6 billionji ngam hakkilanki Riftorde Piirooje nde Jihawol Borno wayla walaadu Fuuna Lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ministaajo mo shaanu Piirooje, Hadi Sirika, kanyum on suuditani ka kubaru’en bawti joonde giidal mabbe bee ardiibe haa faada laamu bee Ardiido Buhari.
O wi:“dowko laarani shaani riftorde Piirooje min yaari taskaramji 3 feerefeere fuubo yerdaama huuwe kuude den haa Riftorde Piirooje nder Jihawol Maiduguri.
Dow ko laarani yibbinol nyibaali (FAAN), (NAMA) (NCAA) haa Riftorde Piirooje nde Murtala Mohammed International Airport,haa Gasol Lagos, Hadi Sirika wi wakiili’en majaliisaabe ndotti’en hokki sawriinde on tan dow haalakan.

Directaajo maudo mo Radio kongol Najeeria, VON, Jubrin Ndace efti alkawaal wo’utungo yake daraja Radio man ngam yigo Radio kongol Najeeria wurtini kubaruuji nanadi di famtinta ummatore leddindi ha ma be luttude lesde afrrica e duniyaaru no foti.
Directaajo on beddi wiigo Radio kongol Najeeria fa;an yesso be umtugo taskaramji di welninta ummatore mussamman heditobe Radio man, ha hokkabe bososel natugo nder taskaramji din heba kambe ma be hokka mballa mabbe ha ko yarata sarede yeeso bana no mara haaje.
O holli nanema Radio man andira be duggungo taskaramji nder nemde ko nandi bana Turaaakore, Fransaare,Aabre,Suwahilli, Hausaare, Igboore, Yorobaare, ema Fulfulde; ngammai darnde wola kude tan huwete jonta ngma yigo nasaraaku hebaama.
Mr Ndace efti alkawaal man on ha wakkati nde o fuddanno kude ha sare Radio mai bawo nde Ardiido leddi hokkimo Ardungal kesal yande altinedo ha Abuja.
Directaajo keso on manni kude de Directaajo wallinowo kude huwi Mr Osita Okechukwu mo o holli habdi masin ha kude teddude de shakkol habaruuji ha ragare o yelanimo hairu.

Leyɗeele tati rewo Orop (Danemark, Suwed, Finlannde) ina keewi limtaneede yeruuji moƴƴi to bannge jaŋde, ɓamtaare, njuɓɓudi renndo, weytaare ekn... Yeru, to Danemark...
Fedde Kawral gure Ngalluure Saŋe (Commune de Sanghé) gonɗe e Nuwaasot njuɓɓinii yeewtere fattamlamre e nder Nuwaasot to dingiral pine biyetengal Galaksi (Galaxy) ñalnde...
Waɗiino jamanuuji, hedde 1987, diɗɗal sanɗaaji janngatnooɗi e duɗe Qur’aana ceertuɗe, sukaaɓe rentuɓe njiidi miijo, kawriti e yiɗde rentude, caggal won ko njanngi, wooda...

Holko nuɗɗinii e tatiwal barmooda? Jaabawol ko hay gooto anndaa so wonaa joomiraaɗo bajjo gooto. Hay gooto majjaani wonde wertaango leydi ko 510 km karee. Ko woni heen ndiyam ko:
365 milyon km, ko woni heen njoorndi, walla ko heddii ko, ko: 145 milyon km karee. jaameeteer mayri ko 12756 km. E nder maaje ɗe hay siɓre walla diraa heddaaki tawa annduɓe njiytaani.
Kono nokku gooto nani e nder maayo fiiltiingo Atalantik (geec). Ɗoon ina haawi annduɓe ɓe, gila ko ɓooyi haa nyalawma hannde o. Ko tagi ɗ
... (402 chars skipped) ... 
stre), won wiyɓe kadi, ko Seyɗeneeji koɗi ɗoon.
Kono seyɗeneeji ɗii kam sellaani, ko miijooji annduɓe ndeen, gila ko ɓooyi. Ngati ɗuum ganndal kesal goongɗinaani seyɗaane ina woodi saka hoɗa ɗoon. Kono enen kam, haadi ko en juulɓe, en mbaawaa salaade seyɗeneeji. Laaɗe keewɗe njooliima ɗoon, kono kala gabbiiɗo yiiloyaade artataa, ko toon heddotoo, hay laalaaɗe mum njiytetaake. Laaɗe diwooje keewɗe
mbeeyii ɗoon ngam abbaade laaɗe goɗɗe majjunooɗe, kono njahii ngrtaani.

haa hayti, fayi Portoriko, haa yettii diidol jurol 40 degeree
(nguleeki) bannge hiirnaange. Ina woɗɗi duunde Amarik nde, fotde 930 km e nder maayo he. Njaajeendi wertaango nokku ɗo bone o woni ɗo, maa won 77000 km kaaree. Ndeen nde kiristoof Kolommboo yahatnoo Amarik nde, o wirtiima seraaji nokku o, kono o yettaaki ɗoon, e wiyde makko, o sooyniima toon naanogal mawngal, lewlewndu woɗeeru (lumière rouge).

E hitaande kala, 21 Fabraa’iru on, ko ñalaande mawningol haalaaji muynaaɗi ɗin e nder winndere nden fof (Journée Internationale de la langue maternelle), woni ko suɓanii en nden ñalaande, ko UNESCO e hitaande 1999. Hinde jogitii faandaareeji ɗuuɗuɗi, tawaa e majji: senndodugol weltaare e pine hakkunde ɗemɗe winndere nden…

AB: Wano honno?
TB: Ɗum ko e coftale am ɗen yownondiri, ko woni tun e siforagol am koɗo e leydi ndi mi jooɗii e mun ndin, huutorgol ɗemngal am ngal ko ka jaayɗe kumpitorɗe (Media) ɓuri dolnorde (talifon, internet, ekn).
AB: Hol no yiiru-ɗaa ɗemngal mon ngal ko feewi?
TB: Si mi ɓaarorii ko jokkaa e golle fii ɓamtal Fulfulde, mi wi’ay wonde ngal ɗemngal sakkitoray wonde ɗemngal gannde kese.
Timmii.

Rewɓe kafayɓe jawle ko ɓe gollira, holko nafa mum e nder faggudu leyɗe?
Saakitaama ñannde :
Tedduɓe keɗiiɓe RFI Fulfulde, on jaaraama, bismilla mon e yewtere men Dinngiral Rewɓe e dow rfi Fulfulde.Yewtere toɓɓere nden hannde ana haala ko faati e rewɓe wonɓe e baale walla dente kafayɗe kalisi ko ɗe gollilara. Holno ɗee pelle gollirta ? Holko woni nafa majje e faggudu leyɗe ɗee ?E ley yewtere, eɗen tawdaa e Haajara Maamuudu hooreejo walde rewɓe Kamerun daraniinde wallugol sukaaɓe alyatiima no janngira. No tawaa e yewtere ndee kadi Aysata Jibi Tall jeyaɗo e fedde wi’eeteede Ɓamtaare rewɓe ko Podoor nder Senegal.Dr Haamidu Bari jeeyaɗo Gine yo hertorɗo faggu e ɓantaare woni koɗo men hannde e yewtere.E yewtere men garoore ndee, en kalan ko faati e rewɓe ɗaniiɓe heɓuɓe tiiɗalaaji. Holko woni sabu yoppugol ɓe cuuɗi maɓɓe e sukaaɓe maɓɓe ɓe yaha e leyɗe janane? Oɗon baawi hokkunde mijjoji mon e tonngoode amen WhatsApp 00 221 76 644 12 74.

En podiino artude e kewu mawningol 28 noowammbar 2017, haa teeŋti noon e nanngal rewɓe maayraaɓe kam e sukaaɓe ɓe baabiraaɓe mum en mbaranoo, sabu mum en weeynude e sarde ɗereeji ina ɗaɓɓa nde warnooɓe worɓe mum en e baabiraaɓe mum en jamma 27 jofi 28 noowammbar 1991 to Inaal ñaawetee…

Kono so won wallitɓe mo e ndeen feere (won ɓaleeɓe ina limtee e mum en) Dental fedde maayraaɓe e alyatiimu en wonaa noon yiiri ɗum : ɓeen miijo mum en ko hay gooto waawnata ɗum en yejjitde e yaafaade walla jaɓde njeenaari tawa ñaawoore warkoyeeeɓe adaaki ɗum. Ɓe kaaɗaani ɗoon, ɓe pelliti hitaande hikka nde ko abbaade Abdul Ajiiju nder leydi, ɓe kollira ɗum kañum e warkoyeeɓe yahdunooɓe e mum, kam e kayhayɗinaaɓe e aduna oo

e pij, ngama mbeytoo, njejjita ko ɓenni, maa taw ɓe limtaano heen ɓe mette piɓii e nder deedi mum en, etee piɓaani yejjitirde ɗum nii tan. Ko ɗum addani en wiyde “cide nguddinii weendu” to Kayhayɗi.
Ndeeɗoo darnde nde maayraaɓe ndarii hollirii en tan so ɓesngu fellitii ummaade ngam haɓaade fenaande e yooltude hujja mum dagiiɗo, fetel e konu e piggal ruttintaa ɗum caggal. Rewɓe maayraaɓe e alyatiimu en ndañii manoore sabu ɓe njobii diminna, maayɓe maɓɓe kaaytii yeeweede e qabriiji mum en.

Ballo ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya, Kashim Shettima wi Lesdi Naajeeriya yidi kabbidal narral bee Lesde yaasi musamman ko laarani shaanu rufayontaaku.
Ballo ardiido on suuditi haalakan haa moobre majaliisa moobgal Lesde Duuniyaaru UN dowko laarani feesinki nyaamannde haa Galluure Rome,nder Lesdi Italy.
Dow haala wurtinki ceede ngam haaje huuba bo, VP Shettima wi Lesdi Naajeeriya yidi walliinde sanne ‘e kawtal koppi ngam yiiki be itti Ceede mballa nyebbam peeturuljam.
VP Shettima besdika bee wiiki Ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya Bola Tinubu taskani weltinki ngurndam ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya nder Ardungal maako.
SADIQ ALFA

Anambra International Cargo Airport Umuleri woni dowla dowla nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon ha Ivite-Umueri nder Umuleri, Anambra State.
Tariha[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
Landu ngam haɓɓugo garowol ngol fuɗɗii haɓɓugo dowla lesdi Anambra ha 11 abriil 2017, e haɓɓugo haɓɓugo duuɓi tati ɓaawo. Nde dowla fuɗɗii haɓɓugo dowla lesdi Anambra Willie Obiano nder lewru Oktooba 30, 2017.
Ha lewru 2 Desemba 2021, Dowlaaji Naijeriya ngam jaɓɓugo jaaynde lesdi Anambra haɓɓugo jaayɗe ngam kuuɗe jaaynde, caggal nde jaayɗe fuɗɗii kuuɗe jaayndi dow 7 Desemba 2021. Nder lewru arandeeji mum fu, o waɗi fuɗnaaki 142 je ɗon hawta yimɓe 3,865.
Ha Maars 2022, gariiri huɓɓugo huɓɓugo Ziegler hokki haa dow dow dow dow.
Lindiya e nokkuuje jaaynde[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
Template:Airport destination listLindiindiindiindiinde nder Umueri, nder Anambra East LGA nder Anambra state, ɗon ɗoofta ɓurɗe ɓooyiinde ngam ɗum ɗon ɗon ɗooftiindiindiindi. Watooje ɗe njaara haa haa dowla dowla ɗon jeyaa. Yimɓe ɗiɗo ɗon huutore ɗo: Air Peace e United Nigeria Airlines.

Hukuuma ka hakkilinta kude police’en nder leddindi wii be do wadi anniya tokkugo umrore nde Ardido leddi hokki be duuw kala rentowo accha tokkugo bibbe siyasa daga jonta be harmini be doftugo lamminabe.
Hukuuma kan andini duuw daga joonta be tokkan didadi ko wei’iti kude police’en ndenbo dole police’en mai tokkan didadi din bana no mara haaje ha kude mabbe.
Ministaajo pamaro mo kude police’en leddindi, Mrs Imaan Suleiman, on famtini banning mai ha moftorde jonde beddol andal nyalde didi duum hukuuma kan taskitini police’en ngam andinabe kude dabareeji kude rento kesum duum hukuuma kan wangini.
Mrs Suleiman, wii police ‘en tawwi horemum ha nder kude nyiddude musamman tokkago bibbe siyasa be acchi huwango leddi be koti bedo jaggina wobbe fere on tan ngammai daga jonta hei non non.

Hukuuma hakkilanta shaanu janngirde hawti bee ngomnati kawtal Lesdi darni naftirki dereeji seedsramku janngirde digree iga Lesdi Benin enanta Togo.
Darnu man fuddi kuugal iga 2 Lewru January, 2024, bawti hooreejo mo hakkilanta kubaruuji hukuumawa ngan Mrs. Augustina Obilor-Duru suuditika.
Haalakan wadaama on ngam ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya acca yahuki musamman ngam jannga haa Lesde den 2.
Hukumawa ngan tiggi komitiwa ngam lartuki no haalakan jogitirte wala gacce,
Taskaramji kimminiidi ko yaadata bee gidaadi Ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya Bola Ahmed Tinubu GCFR musamman ngam jahargal yeeso janngirde.
Huumawa ngan hawti kopi bee ardiibe enanta taskanoobe taskaramji ngam sembidinki jahargal yeeso janngirde nder Lesdi Naajeeriya.”
SADIQ ALFA

Ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya, Bola Tinubu wadi kabbidal bee Lesdi India dow ko hewtanta majjinol ceede $1 billionji nayraaje ceede Lesdi Naajeeriya musamman ngam sembidinki kampaniiji di DICON.
Kabbidal ngal wadaama on ngam DICON bee gebe 40% haro waduki ko haandi nder hitaande 2027.
Ardiido on wi wadi niiman ngam yiiki golle feesaama ‘e kuude jahargal yeesohebaama nder Lesdi Naajeeriya .
Tinubu foodi hakkiilo rufayonta’en ben bee wiiki be Lesdi Naajeeriya do mari kobe mari haaje fu ko laarani Luumooko ngam sembidinki kilantaaji riskuuji hakkunde mabbe.
Kadima ministaajo mo hakkilanta shaanu Ceede ‘e jkilantaaji riskuuji haa Lesdi Naajeeriya, Mr Wale Edun, mani tiinaaje ardiibe kampaniiji kawtal koppi haa Naajeeriya bana,Mr Naveen Jindau, hooreejo Jindal Steel and Power Limited, bee kuude rufayontaaku ko hewtani $3 billionji ngam jahargal yeeso Lesdi Naajeeriya.
Non O hawti manoore nden faaki yaalirbe haa nokkuure giidal G20 nofoti enanta luttube ardiibe be kampaniiji di kuude jahargal yeeso kilantaaji riskuuji haa Lesdi Naajeeriya.
SADIQ ALFA

Kariima bin Ahmadu bin Muhammadu bin Hatiim Al-Marwaziyya (969-1069) ko ganndo hadiis e teeminannde 11ɓiire.[1][2][3][4]
Karima jibinaa ko e wuro wiyeteengo Kushmihan sara Merv. Caggal ɗuum o hoɗi Makka.[2]
Kariima wonnoo ko laamu e dow Sahii Bukhaari. O jannginii binndol al-Bukhari e almudɓe kadi ganndal makko e jannginde makko ina teddiniree no feewi.[1] O anndiranoo ko "musnida nokku ceniɗo."[2] Worɓe capanɗe tato e jeenay e debbo gooto ndartinii geɗe e dow yamiroore makko.[2] Karima ina anndiranoo isnad mum tedduɗo. Janngingol makko e ganndal makko ina manti Abu Dharr mo Herat.[2][5]
Alkhatib Bagdaadi e Abuu Gana’im Nursi nanii e makko.[1]
E joofnirde nguurndam makko, o anndaa ko o jannginoowo e ganndo.[2] Ko o Hanaafiyanke.[6] Karima meeɗaa resde, ko celibateer e asket.[2][7] Luwis Massingoon jokkondiri mo e dille futuwwa rewɓe ɗe Khadiija Al-Jahniya sosi. Ko ɗum wonnoo debbo nannduɗo e renndooji futuwwa worɓe, daraniiɓe ƴoƴre, jikkuuji, e dewal.[7]

E kabaaruuji Burkina Faso keeŋen alkamisa, yumaan Raayt Wooc waalde daraniinde ndeenaagu hakke ɓii aadama yaltinii ciimtol e dow warngooji siwil en to Burkina. E ngol Ciimtol, fedde hollitii, konu Burkina ana tuuma warde ko foti siwil en 223 e ley gure ɗiɗi rewo leydi ndi. Soro e Nonden. Ɗum waɗii 25 lewru 2ɓordu e ndee hitaande 2024. E ko tayka e ɗii lebbi ƴaɓɓiiɗi, tefooje keewɗe ngaɗaama e dow warngooji siwil en.
Saakitaama ñannde : 26/04/2024 – 12:17
IIlariya Alegrosi wiɗitiyankeejo to Yumaan Raay Wooc. Originaire yettaangal saha kawrital maɓɓe to worgo Mali e hitaande 2013 DR
Jonnon, ana famɗi, ko konngol laamu Burkina naa tunnelier adunaaru nduu nana. Ɗum saabi Ilariya Alegrosi, wiɗitiyanke e Yumaan Raayt Wooc ana nodda leyɗe ɗe fuu ndaroo, e darɗe mum en yalla hakkeeji siwil en ndeene. Keɗoɗen mo e faandu haala Abdullaay DIKKO

Won ko ƴeeŋataa, hiiɗɗataa, waɗde e kala sahaa, ko ko soccortee. Mi tawii miijiyankooɓe ɗiɗo ene njeewta ko fayti e dawrugol e pinal. Jeddondiral ngal yowitinoo ko e holi ko seerndi kelme ɗiɗi ɗee (Pinal e Dawrugol) ? Addunoo ɗum noon, ko heen gooto wiyde « tato potaani waɗde dawrugol : Neɗɗo pinal e Ganndo kanum e galo ». Daliiu makko ko nii o facciriri ɗum :
« Ganndo oo, luulndiiɗo e gonduɗo e laamu fof ene ndañi e mum haaju. Neɗɗo Pinal oo, so tawii naatii e luulndo, laamu ene waawi huutoraad
... (1760 chars skipped) ... 
o golle dental, mbele kala jeyaaɗo e maggal ene waawa heen yiytaade hoyre mum ».
Ellee noon ko ɗo firo pinal ɗoo ɓur-mi dañde caɗeele. Nde tawnoo, pinal wonaa huunde memortoonde junngo, saka mi annda so yaaf, so tiiɗ, so ɗaat walla ñaaɗ. Wonaa kadi ko yiyortoo yitere saka mi annda goobu mum. Wonaa ko waawi metteede saka mi annda dakamme mum. Mi waawaa uurnaade ɗum kadi saka mi annda balngol ngol. Ko noon ne kadi, haalataa saka mi heɓtina dille walla sawtawol mum.
Kono kay, sikke alaa, pinal aade
... (1760 chars skipped) ...
re mum, jeyɓe ngal ɓee mballitira golle mumen, ngonka mumen e baɗe mumen. Waɗde kaalen ngal men. Njanngen ngal, njanngiren ngal. Ɗuum noon gasata ko maa ngal waɗa loowdi moƴƴiri, mbelndi, ndakmundi, nafoori, mbaawndi wuurnude e humtireede haajuuji. Waɗde alaa e sago annduɓe fannuuji janngaaɗi e ɗemɗe goɗɗe ɓee mbiɗta, pula, njanngina min, minen ɓe njanngaano ɓee, ɓe kolla min kadi laabi, ɓe ɗowa min, haa min mbaawa tabitinde. Yo Alla wallitir cellal, kisal, nanondiral e kawral.
Malal Sammba GISE

1 BIBEL IWI HAA ALLAH
“Ko winnda nder Deftere Allah fuu iwi haa Ruuhu Allah.”—2 Timote 3:16
Ngam ɗume Bibel nanndaay defte feere?
Bibel fassitaama nder ɗemɗe baakin ujine ɗiɗi e teemeɗɗe joweego e Bibelji miliyarji ngurtinaama.
Nde ɗon ekkitina en kuuje ɗe en fotaay heɓugo nder defte feere.
-
Mo waŋgini Bibel, ɗum Allah.
-
Nden Allah ɗowi yimɓe ngam winndugo numooji maako.
2 BIBEL ƊUM DEFTERE ANNABAAKUUJI
“Allah mo fewataa.”—Titus 1:2
Ngam ɗume en nuɗɗinta ko Bible wiʼata?
-
Duuɓi teemeɗɗe hiddeeko ɗum waɗa, Bibel wi’no Baabila tammi jaaleego.
-
Annabaakuuji Bibel ɗon hiɓɓa jotta.
-
En foti nuɗɗingo ko Bibel wi’ata ko laarani garanɗum.
3 BIBEL WINNDAAMA NGAM WALLITITGO MA
“Min woni Jawmiraawo [Yeehova, TMN], Allah mon ekkitinɗo on ko nafata on.”—Esaaya 48:17
Ɗume a ekkiti dow Bibel?
-
Ko Bibel wi’ata dow annde duniyaaru ɗum gooŋga.
-
Winnduɓe Bibel ɓe gooŋgaʼen.
-
Yeesu hokki en sawaari dow noy heɓugo seyo, wondugo bee woɗɓe, toraago, laarugo ceede.
4 BIBEL FOTI SANJUGO JOONDE MA
“Ngam wolde Allah nde yeere, nde ɗon waɗa nafuuda.”—Ibraniŋke’en 4:12
Ɗume wolde Allah foti waɗango on?
Nde foti wallugo ma faamugo nufayeeji Allah.
Nde foti wallugo ma anndugo no a wa’i.
Nde foti faamtingo ma ko Allah yiɗi a waɗa.
Allah yiɗi a jaŋnga, a ekkita, e a yiɗa Bibel.

Caad:Lumndiiɓe laamu noddii seppooji e nder Njamena e nder ca'e goɗɗe
Saakitaama ñannde :
Seppooji waɗii hannde talaata bimmbi law Njamena. Ɗiɗo maayii e seppooɓe ɓen, seeditanɗe hollii wonnde ko fellaaɓe. Sukaaɓe yaltuɓe hollugol mettu-ɓerɗe maɓɓe. E wi'i maɓɓe, ɓe jaɓaali lomtal ɓiɗɗo Idriis Debi on.
Suukaaɓe heewɓe mottindiri bimmbi ɗoo Njamena, laamorgo Caad e ca’e yogaaje e nder leydi ndin.
Hiɓe lamndi yo konunkooɓe ardiiɓe laamu hakkudewu ngun immo.
Polisiiɓe e konunkooɓe no imminaa ngam haɗugol ɗin seppooji. Ɓe fetttinii ñamaku walla gaas e seppooɓe ɓen.
Seppooɓe ɗiɗo waraama, arano on ko to laamorgo Njamena, ɗiɗaɓo on e ko nokku wi’eteeɗo Mundu worgo Caad. Kumpite heewɗe no holli ɓee ɗiɗo ko fellaaɓe. Seppooji ɗin non dartaaki fii kala konunkooɓe e polisiiɓe ɓen no etaade fii accingol ɗi.
Ɓee sukaaɓe wonɓe waɗude ɗii seppooji, no sunnude pineeji, bonna estasiyonji yeeyirɗi esansi.
Hiɓe wowla gonnguɗi mettuɗi e hoore Faransi, leydi ndi ɓe tuumiri bammbugol General Mahamat Idriis Debi lomtiiɗo baaba makko caggal maayde makko.
Ɗii seppooji waɗii bimmbi ñannde Albeer Pahimi Padakke toɗɗaa hooreejo jaagorɓe Caad.

Holko woni nafa ɗerewol jibinannde Abdulaay Harisuu ?
Saakitaama ñannde :
Yuppi yontere nde e yeewtere Ko mbiiɗon ko Abdulaay Harisuu. Oo yoo Pullo taweteeɗo lesɗi Camerun dariiɗo noon heɓa kala suka, kala ɓiɗɗo heɓa ɗerewol jibinannde (kaayit jibinannde, talkuru rimeede).
O artii e nde yeewtere holko saabii o darni kanko e Amadu Mustafa Njaay nde eɓɓande wiyeteende “Fonds Urgence Identité Afrique” hono siforto e kadi deftere nde ndeftere nde o winnde illa 2013, ngam haalde ko yowitii faa hannde e keɓugol ɗereeji “Les enfants fantômes”.
Fulfulde faaminiinde
Nde yontere en kaalan haala wakkiti

Hol ko woni Ñebbe daay?
Ñebbe daay ko puɗol ngol baramlefi pamari, jibinoowol potte. Ko leɗki ki nganndu-ɗaa nafoore mum ina yaaji, etee yimɓe heewɓe wiɗtooɓe ko fayti leɗɗe safaara keso, hono ko wiyateeko safaara tuubakooɓe, maa yimɓe tan mehɓe, walla safrirooɓe leɗɗe, hono wileeɓe men walla seernaaɓe men, kamɓe fof, eɓe korsini kii lekki.

Demmba Aamadu Bari sannkiima jamma 8 mee (duujal) 2023, caggal rafi juutɗo. Demmba Aamadu Bari jeyanoo ko e yimɓe ɓurɓe horsinde ɗemngal Pulaar. So en teyii mbiyen ko ɗuum nii wonnoo nguurndam makko fof. Ko ɗuum waɗi Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani sunaade heen no feewi sabu waasii jaggal mawngal.
Enen noon gila nganndu-ɗen Dammba Aamadu Bari e hitaande 1992 rewrude e yarham Jibi Hammee Lih, (Yo Alla yurmo mo, yaafoo mo) ɗaɓɓirnooɗo en jannginde ɓe hiisa e Pulaar, nganndir-ɗen mo ko jannginde Pulaar haa nde o ruttii ndee.
He nder ɗuum ɗuum Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar kam Fooyre Ɓamtaare, ine nduwanii kala jiɗɗo Pulaar ɗo woni, ine nduwanoo kadi ɓesngu Muritani no diidorinoo sabu birnagol oo ngenndiyanke laaɓtuɗo. Yo Alla yurmo mo, yaafoo mo, yo Alla haarni mo aljanna.

Ardiido leddi Najeeriya Bola Ahmed Tinubu wanni yimobe gimi jamanu ha leddindi hebibe teddinoore maunder nde hitande do barka be hebugo samdineego ha kude gimi ema gamarlle de Allah hokkibe basira ha duuw mai.
Yimobe hebibe samdineego man hauri be , Burna Boy, Davido, Olamide,Tems ,Asake be Ayra Starr, bawo nde be supta hander yimobe dudbe natiibe aratikko kude gimi mai je duggina hikka, ngammai on wadi Ardiido leddi Tinubu manni be be tidal ema sattinki jokke duum be sattini ha gimi ema gamarle jamanu je hokkibe hatimmeje teddude nder duniyaru.
Ha habaruuwol ngol shakowo habaruuji ha office ru Ardiido leddiIn Ajuri Ngelale, wurti nden wanningol jude sendanni tefoobe habbaruuji ha Abuja nyande altine do wii yimobe ben do marri basira gimi ema tidal dabbutuggo nobe jogira koe mabb.
O yonitiri ummutoobe duuw wunda sana’aji di hokkatabe daraja ema samdineego ha duniyaru ta be joda mere be billa koe mabbe ema leddi mabbe.
A BELLO.
